FuncDef:
The segment behavior command creates a segment behavior and displays the segment behavior view, or displays the view of an existing segment behavior.
The undo segment behavior command deletes a segment behavior. The segment behavior command creates a segment behavior and displays the segment behavior view, or displays the view of an existing segment behavior. The undo segment behavior command deletes a segment behavior. By default, no segment behavior is created. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a segment behavior.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, starting with a letter or digit. The defined behavior name cannot be the name of the traffic behavior predefined by the system.
